definition: away from the wind, on the side exposed to the wind, the side of something that is toward the wind
details:
adverb
- away from the wind
= example: away from the wind
= synonyms: downwind
adjective
- on the side exposed to the wind
= example: on the side exposed to the wind
noun
- the side of something that is toward the wind
- the direction from which the wind is coming
